statements: SELECT * FROM time_based_one_time_passwords;
SELECT id, otp_code, creation_time, expiration_time, user_id FROM time_based_one_time_passwords;
SELECT user_id, expiration_time, otp_code, creation_time, id FROM time_based_one_time_passwords;
SELECT id, otp_code FROM time_based_one_time_passwords WHERE user_id = 100;
SELECT * FROM time_based_one_time_passwords WHERE expiration_time > '2023-01-01';
SELECT * FROM time_based_one_time_passwords WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT otp_code, creation_time, expiration_time FROM time_based_one_time_passwords WHERE id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT * FROM time_based_one_time_passwords WHERE creation_time BETWEEN '2022-01-01 00:00:00' AND '2022-12-31 23:59:59';
SELECT id, otp_code FROM time_based_one_time_passwords WHERE expiration_time < NOW();
SELECT * FROM time_based_one_time_passwords ORDER BY expiration_time DESC, creation_time ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM time_based_otp_logs;
SELECT user_id, otp_code FROM time_based_otp_logs ORDER BY time_created DESC;
SELECT id, user_id, otp_code FROM time_based_otp_logs WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT * FROM user_verification;
SELECT user_id, has_verified_otp FROM user_verification WHERE has_verified_otp = true;
SELECT * FROM user_verification WHERE has_verified_otp = true;
SELECT user_id, otp_code FROM time_based_otp_logs WHERE time_created > '2021-01-01' ORDER BY time_created DESC;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) as total_entries FROM time_based_otp_logs GROUP BY user_id HAVING total_entries > 2;
SELECT user_id, otp_code FROM time_based_otp_logs WHERE user_id = 'a5f79ce3-2ae0-4cb4-baac-3fed15c584fe';
SELECT user_id, time_created FROM time_based_otp_logs WHERE otp_code LIKE '123%' ORDER BY time_created ASC;
SELECT * FROM otp_logs ORDER BY time_stamp DESC;
SELECT user_id, time_stamp FROM otp_logs WHERE user_id = 123;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE username = 'john_doe';
SELECT user_id, email FROM users WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com';
SELECT user_id, otp_code, verified FROM otp_verification WHERE verified = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE user_id = 2 ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT id, user_id, otp_code FROM otp_logs WHERE time_stamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31' ORDER BY time_stamp ASC;
SELECT users.username, otp_logs.otp_code FROM users INNER JOIN otp_logs ON users.user_id = otp_logs.user_id WHERE users.email LIKE '%@example.com';
SELECT users.username, otp_verification.verified FROM users LEFT JOIN otp_verification ON users.user_id = otp_verification.user_id ORDER BY users.username ASC;
SELECT * FROM user;
SELECT id, username FROM user WHERE username = 'john_doe';
SELECT * FROM time_based_otp ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT user_id, otp_code FROM otp_verification WHERE verified = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM otp_logs WHERE action = 'login' ORDER BY log_time ASC;
SELECT id, user_id, created_at FROM time_based_otp WHERE created_at > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY created_at DESC LIMIT 10;

SELECT user_id, otp_code FROM time_based_otp JOIN otp_logs ON time_based_otp.user_id = otp_logs.user_id WHERE otp_logs.action = 'login' AND otp_logs.log_time > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY otp_logs.log_time DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM user WHERE username LIKE '%admin%' AND password_hash = '123456';
SELECT id, user_id, otp_code, verified FROM otp_verification WHERE verified = TRUE ORDER BY verified_at DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT * FROM time_based_otp WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174001' AND created_at BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT user_id, email FROM users WHERE username LIKE 'A%';
SELECT * FROM otp_logs WHERE created_at >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE email LIKE '%@gmail.com';
SELECT * FROM otp_logs WHERE created_at BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-01';
SELECT user_id, otp_code, created_at FROM otp_logs WHERE user_id = 5 ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT u.username, u.email, h.otp_code, h.verified_at FROM users u JOIN otp_history h ON u.user_id = h.user_id WHERE h.verified_at IS NOT NULL;
